ActHazardous Products Act
SubjectConsumer Products Containing Lead (Contact with Mouth) Regulations
PrecisCONSUMER PRODUCTS CONTAINING LEAD (CONTACT WITH MOUTH) REGULATIONS by placing a regulatory limit of 90 mg/kg total lead on certain consumer products.
